block.p: CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Activated RHP Aaron Myette from the 15-day disabled list and optioned him to Birmingham of the Southern League. National League MONTREAL EXPOS--Placed RHP Scott Strickland on the 15-day disabled list retroactive to May 3.

CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Activated RHP Aaron Myette from the 15-day disabled list and optioned him to Birmingham of the Southern League. National League MONTREAL EXPOS--Placed RHP Scott Strickland on the 15-day disabled list retroactive to May 3.
DETROIT SHOCK--Waived G Isatu Milton. USA Basketball USAB--Named Geno Auriemma coach of the 2000 women's junior world team.
ATLANTA FALCONS--Signed CB Anthony Midget. NEW YORK JETS--Signed CB-S Tony Scott. Re-signed WR Dedric Ward, RB-KR Leon Johnson and S Chris Hayes.
CHICAGO BLACKHAWKS--Fired Lorne Molleken, coach. COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS--Signed LW Mathieu Darche and LW Jonathan Schill.
